messages.firstPerson: You tibble at {target} with great significance.
messages.secondPerson: {actor} tibbles at you. You have no idea what that means, but you feel honored.
messages.thirdPerson: {actor} tibbles at {target}. The air crackles with confusion.
messages.untargeted: You tibble mysteriously. You're not sure what that means, but it feels right.
messages.untargetedRoom: {actor} tibbles mysteriously. Nobody knows what that means, but they're all impressed.
